Hydras::

Hydras didn't said anything and with his other hand typed some 
buttons, and images appeared, and something like a base was 
installed inside the volcano... it was...

"Do you like the place that I choose for our future base, my dear?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 8/4/03 11:58:32 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Hydras placed an arm in Maxima shoulder and he said "are you 
> > courious my dear??? remember that curiousity killed the cat, but 
It 
> > won't kill you... See the hologram, my dear"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> She smirked up at him, "I hasn't claimed this cat yet. Nor will it 
ever," as 
> she looked at the hologram & became serious again. Totally at ease 
around him, 
> the arm more of a comfort & something that she unconsciously 
longed for. But, 
> duty came first.
> 
> "Yes.. I do. What is this?"
